title: Serena Williams 'denied access' to Paris restaurant, staff explains incident, says ' she was ....'
content: Serena Williams criticized a luxury Paris hotel in a social media post after being denied entry to the hotel's rooftop restaurant due to full bookings. ​​Sharing a post on X Williams said: "Yikes @peninsulaparis I've been denied access to rooftop to eat in a empty restaurant of nicer places but never with my kids. Always a first."
summary: Serena Williams criticized a luxury Paris hotel in a social media post after being denied entry to the hotel's rooftop restaurant due to full bookings. ​​Sharing a post on X Williams said: "Yikes @peninsulaparis I've been denied access to rooftop to eat in a empty restaurant of nicer places but never with my kids. Always a first."

title: Kamala Harris interviewed three for VP pick but Tim Walz got it because...
content: A day after Kamala Harris chose Minnesota governor Tim Walz as her running mate in a surprising move sidestepping more popular Josh Shapiro, reports claimed that there was a particular reason why Tim Walz got the gig. His message to Harris was clear that he was not angling for anything else and that's what probably got him the opportunity, reports said.
summary: A day after Kamala Harris chose Minnesota governor Tim Walz as her running mate in a surprising move sidestepping more popular Josh Shapiro, reports claimed that there was a particular reason why Tim Walz got the gig. His message to Harris was clear that he was not angling for anything else and that's what probably got him the opportunity, reports said.

title: Democrats hope Tim Walz will open doors to more white votes for Kamala Harris
content: Kamala Harris selected Tim Walz as her vice-presidential pick. Despite facing criticism from MAGA Republicans, Walz brought a folksy charm and broad appeal, especially to white rural and suburban voters. At a Philadelphia rally, he defended his policies and aimed to swing critical voters in key states. His mid-western appeal contrasted sharply with the opposition's tactics.
summary: Kamala Harris selected Tim Walz as her vice-presidential pick. Despite facing criticism from MAGA Republicans, Walz brought a folksy charm and broad appeal, especially to white rural and suburban voters. At a Philadelphia rally, he defended his policies and aimed to swing critical voters in key states. His mid-western appeal contrasted sharply with the opposition's tactics.

title: Watch: Kamala Harris' viral expression when Tim Walz cracks couch joke on JD Vance
content: As team Kamala and Tim attended their first rally in Philadelphia, Kamala Harris' reaction to Tim Walz ripping into JD Vance went viral. In a now viral clip, Kamala can be seen looking at Tim in admiration and clapping as Tim said he can't wait to debate JD Vance, Trump's running mate -- provided JD is willing to "get off the couch and show up".
summary: As team Kamala and Tim attended their first rally in Philadelphia, Kamala Harris' reaction to Tim Walz ripping into JD Vance went viral. In a now viral clip, Kamala can be seen looking at Tim in admiration and clapping as Tim said he can't wait to debate JD Vance, Trump's running mate -- provided JD is willing to "get off the couch and show up".

title: US says Thai party dissolution jeopardizes democracy
content: The United States on Wednesday criticized a Thai court's dissolution of the main opposition party, saying it ran against democracy in the longtime US ally. The State Department said it was "deeply concerned" by the decision on the Move Forward Party which "disenfranchises the more than 14 million Thais" who voted for it.
summary: The United States on Wednesday criticized a Thai court's dissolution of the main opposition party, saying it ran against democracy in the longtime US ally. The State Department said it was "deeply concerned" by the decision on the Move Forward Party which "disenfranchises the more than 14 million Thais" who voted for it.

title: 'Shocking': Donald Trump calls Tim Walz a smarter version of Kamala Harris
content: Former US president and Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump gave his first reaction to his opponent Kamala Harris picking Minnesota Guv Tim Walz as her running mate and said it was a shocking decision. In an interview on Fox & Friends Wednesday morning, Trump said it was an insult to the Jewish people. "He's (Tim Walz) a smarter version of her (Kamala Harris) if you want to know the truth. He is probably the same as Bernie Sanders...there has never been a ticket like this," Trump said.
summary: Former US president and Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump gave his first reaction to his opponent Kamala Harris picking Minnesota Guv Tim Walz as her running mate and said it was a shocking decision. In an interview on Fox & Friends Wednesday morning, Trump said it was an insult to the Jewish people. "He's (Tim Walz) a smarter version of her (Kamala Harris) if you want to know the truth. He is probably the same as Bernie Sanders...there has never been a ticket like this," Trump said.

title: Vivek Ramaswamy's prediction about Tim Walz: '...a year from now'
content: The VP pick does not even matter in the presidential election but the choice gave a sneak peak into Kamala Harris' decision making that she would cave in to whichever wing put the most pressure, Vivek Ramaswamy said. "She (Kamala Harris) may or may not be ideological, but she showed which wing she’ll ultimately cave to. It’s more revealing than anything she might say in the next 3 months," Vivek said.
summary: The VP pick does not even matter in the presidential election but the choice gave a sneak peak into Kamala Harris' decision making that she would cave in to whichever wing put the most pressure, Vivek Ramaswamy said. "She (Kamala Harris) may or may not be ideological, but she showed which wing she’ll ultimately cave to. It’s more revealing than anything she might say in the next 3 months," Vivek said.

title: Is Kamala Harris a 'communist'? What Elon Musk said
content: Elon Musk called US presidential contender Kamala Harris a 'communist' for her stance on equitable distribution. Musk's remark came in response to a post highlighting Harris's support for equitable outcomes. Musk previously endorsed Donald Trump and clarified misinformation about his financial contributions to Trump's campaign, denying donations of $45 million per month.
summary: Elon Musk called US presidential contender Kamala Harris a 'communist' for her stance on equitable distribution. Musk's remark came in response to a post highlighting Harris's support for equitable outcomes. Musk previously endorsed Donald Trump and clarified misinformation about his financial contributions to Trump's campaign, denying donations of $45 million per month.

title: Akasa @2: ‘Will be among world’s top 30 airlines by end of decade,’ says Vinay Dube
content: ​​ Despite facing uncertainty over aircraft deliveries from embattled Boeing, Dube assured employees that “we are poised to grow faster than many thought possible” and that Akasa is the “only Indian airline in history to reach a firm book order of this size (226 MAX) within 17 months of commencing operations…. Laying the foundation for unprecedented growth.”
summary: ​​ Despite facing uncertainty over aircraft deliveries from embattled Boeing, Dube assured employees that “we are poised to grow faster than many thought possible” and that Akasa is the “only Indian airline in history to reach a firm book order of this size (226 MAX) within 17 months of commencing operations…. Laying the foundation for unprecedented growth.”

title: Nearly 40,000 and counting: The struggle to keep track of Gaza deaths
Bangladesh crisis: Was Sheikh Hasina ousted in a coup orchestrated by army chief Waker-Uz-Zaman?
content: Bangladesh's army chief, Waker-Uz-Zaman, directed his officers not to fire on protestors enforcing Sheikh Hasina's curfew, resulting in her losing military support. "Hasina no longer had the army's support," an Indian official familiar with the situation said.​​ Following deadly clashes, Hasina fled the country and resigned. Nobel laureate Muhammad Yunus is set to return to lead an interim government amid ongoing unrest.
summary: Bangladesh's army chief, Waker-Uz-Zaman, directed his officers not to fire on protestors enforcing Sheikh Hasina's curfew, resulting in her losing military support. "Hasina no longer had the army's support," an Indian official familiar with the situation said.​​ Following deadly clashes, Hasina fled the country and resigned. Nobel laureate Muhammad Yunus is set to return to lead an interim government amid ongoing unrest.

title: Thai court dissolves progressive Move Forward Party, which won election but failed to take power
content: The Constitutional Court said it voted unanimously to dissolve the party because its campaign to amend the law was considered an attempt to overthrow the nation's constitutional monarchy.
summary: The Constitutional Court said it voted unanimously to dissolve the party because its campaign to amend the law was considered an attempt to overthrow the nation's constitutional monarchy.

title: Peta protesters interrupt Pope Francis' Vatican audience, call on him to denounce bullfighting
content: During Pope Francis' general audience, two Peta activists interrupted the event with banners and t-shirts protesting bullfighting, calling it a sin. Peta has urged the Pope to sever the Catholic Church's association with bullfighting. The Vatican has yet to comment, but such protests have led to mounting criticism of the blood sport linked to Catholic traditions.
summary: During Pope Francis' general audience, two Peta activists interrupted the event with banners and t-shirts protesting bullfighting, calling it a sin. Peta has urged the Pope to sever the Catholic Church's association with bullfighting. The Vatican has yet to comment, but such protests have led to mounting criticism of the blood sport linked to Catholic traditions.

title: Turkey to submit request to join genocide case against Israel in UN court
content: The declaration of intervention will be submitted at the International Court of Justice in The Hague, the official said on condition of anonymity in line with regulations that bar officials from speaking to the media without prior authorization
summary: The declaration of intervention will be submitted at the International Court of Justice in The Hague, the official said on condition of anonymity in line with regulations that bar officials from speaking to the media without prior authorization

title: Tim Walz: From LGBTQ+ rights to military reform, how Harris' new running mate stands out
content: Tim Walz was chosen as Kamala Harris' running mate for the Democratic presidential ticket after Joe Biden opted out of re-election. Walz, Minnesota’s governor, has been a staunch advocate for LGBTQ+ rights, signing laws against conversion therapy and protecting trans youth. His advocacy work extends back to supporting same-sex marriage and repealing "Don’t Ask, Don’t Tell."
summary: Tim Walz was chosen as Kamala Harris' running mate for the Democratic presidential ticket after Joe Biden opted out of re-election. Walz, Minnesota’s governor, has been a staunch advocate for LGBTQ+ rights, signing laws against conversion therapy and protecting trans youth. His advocacy work extends back to supporting same-sex marriage and repealing "Don’t Ask, Don’t Tell."

title: Trump makes bizarre prediction: Rants about Biden crashing DNC and challenges him to debate
Priscilla Chan bakes ‘knee day’ cake for Mark Zuckerberg, Meta CEO responds
content: Mark Zuckerberg shared a heartwarming moment on Instagram after his wife, Priscilla Chan, celebrated his successful nine-month ACL rehab with a special cake. Chan posted a witty message and a photo of a knee-shaped cake, to which Zuckerberg responded with emojis, expressing his gratitude. The post quickly went viral, garnering widespread appreciation from followers.
summary: Mark Zuckerberg shared a heartwarming moment on Instagram after his wife, Priscilla Chan, celebrated his successful nine-month ACL rehab with a special cake. Chan posted a witty message and a photo of a knee-shaped cake, to which Zuckerberg responded with emojis, expressing his gratitude. The post quickly went viral, garnering widespread appreciation from followers.

title: Rajapaksas officially ditch Wickremesinghe, youngest heir announced as candidate for Lanka presidency
NYC turns to drones for flood warnings in vulnerable neighborhoods
content: New York City officials used drones with loudspeakers to warn residents of potential flooding. The initiative, launched due to increasing weather-related threats, targets those in vulnerable areas like basement apartments. The warnings are given in multiple languages, complementing other alert systems like social media and text notifications. The focus is on safety and preparedness during severe rainstorms.
summary: New York City officials used drones with loudspeakers to warn residents of potential flooding. The initiative, launched due to increasing weather-related threats, targets those in vulnerable areas like basement apartments. The warnings are given in multiple languages, complementing other alert systems like social media and text notifications. The focus is on safety and preparedness during severe rainstorms.
